snippet: Britain's Andy Murray ended the French Open reign of Stan Wawrinka on Friday, downing the defending champion in four sets to reach his first Roland Garros final, where he will face the might of world number one Novak Djokovic....
lead_paragraph: Britain's Andy Murray ended the French Open reign of Stan Wawrinka on Friday, downing the defending champion in four sets to reach his first Roland Garros final, where he will face the might of world number one Novak Djokovic.

headline.print_headline: Murray Downs Champion to Reach First French Open Final
headline.main: Murray Downs Champion to Reach First French Open Final
